bibl.title: Seventy-six Hindus v. Seattle Department of Immigration. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21: US District Court, Western Division of Washington, Seatle

div1.p: HERBERT W. MEYERS ATTORNEY AND COUNSELOR AT LAW 430-1-2-3 PIONEER BUILDING SEATTLE
I hereby certify that I have this day examined Mr Bah Singh about to proceed to Manila by the S.S. Fernando Poo and that I find him to be free from al Infectious or Contagious Disease

figure.p: At Manila Jul 1913 Immigration Division Stamp

div1.p: [NOTICE TO PASSENGERS:-This certificate must be stamped at the U.S. Consulate-General before embarking
